products.name: Powdered peanut butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.labels: No gluten, Organic, Vegetarian, Vegan, Vegan Action, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Powdered peanut butter is made from roasted peanuts that are pressed to remove most of their oil, resulting in a lower fat content compared to traditional peanut butter.","It has a longer shelf life than regular peanut butter due to the reduced oil content, making it a more eco-friendly option with less waste.","The production of powdered peanut butter typically uses less water and energy compared to the production of traditional peanut butter, contributing to a lower environmental impact.","Many brands of powdered peanut butter are made from non-GMO peanuts and do not contain added sugars or preservatives, ensuring higher quality and healthier options."]

products.facts: ["Made with high-quality coconut, providing a rich and authentic taste.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a natural and healthy snack option.","Sourced from sustainable coconut farms, supporting local communities and ecological balance."]

products.name: Raspberry Greek Yogurt
products.ingredientsText: Cultured nonfat milk, water, cane sugar, raspberry puree, raspberries, fruit pectin, natural flavors, vegetable juice (for color), guar gum, locust bean gum, lemon juice concentrate, S. Thermophilus, L. Bulgaricus, L. Acidophilus, Bifidus, L. Casei, and L. Rhamnosus.
products.facts: ["Made with real raspberries for natural flavor and color.","Contains live and active cultures for probiotic benefits.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and high in protein for quality nutrition."]
